paytable.wild_description: Wild substitutes any symbol except Scatter.

paytable.wild_description_2: substitutes all symbols in the winning line except for Scatters

errors.102: 102 - Your account is disabled, please contact support.
errors.103: 103 - Your IP is unauthorized, please contact support.
errors.104: 104 - Your account is locked, please contact support.
errors.105: 105 - Your session timed out. Please click ok to reload the page.
errors.201: Woops, an error has occurred. Try to reload the page and contact support referring to the error code 201.
errors.202: Woops, an error has occurred. Try to reload the page and contact support referring to the error code 202.
errors.203: Woops, an error has occurred. Try to reload the page and contact support referring to the error code 203.
errors.204: 204 - Sorry, there was an error while communication with casino server. Please try to reload the page. If the error persists, contact casino support.
errors.205: 205 - Your bet hasn't been accepted, because you have free spins available.
errors.206: 206 - Your free spins ended or expired. Future spins will use your account money.
errors.301:
301 - You have insufficient funds.
Please, refill your balance. The game will be saved for you when you are back.
errors.302: 302 - You have exceeded your wager/lost/session limits.
errors.303: 303 - You exceeded the max bet limit.
errors.401: 401 - The bet amount failed to meet existing table limits.
errors.402: 402 - You exceeded the {value} {currency} max bet limit.
errors.206i: Future spins will use your account money.
errors.default: Woops, an error has occurred. Please contact support referring to the error code {code}.
errors.many_tabs_error: The game is open in several tabs. Close extra tabs to continue.

messages.success_message: Your player's seed had an expected impact on the final result.

paytable.lucky_spin_desc: Four playable reels become available in case the wins in the main game reach the fourfold size of the bet (or higher).
paytable.stacked_wild_desc: Can appear on the 3rd central reel. Stacked wild helps to complete winning combinations by substituting other symbols on the reels, increasing chances of winning.
paytable.replicate_desc: If stacked wilds appear on one of the 4 bonus reels, they are duplicated on the subsequent reels.
paytable.wild_desc: Wild symbol is available in bonus round. Wild replaces any symbol in the line, thereby gives a player a higher chance of winning.
